title: vElavaa vinai
sahitya:
vElavA vinai tIravE vIra



anupallavi



shIla bhakta paripAla jayashIla kAlakAla shivabAla karuNAlavAla



caraNam



sukumAra gurupara pannIru kara parashu pANi sudarshana pANi su kIravANi

ishar paNi

padayuga sarOruha guha yuva mAmaNi unadaruLani kavi kunjaradAsa sadchintAmaNi
